name: AVIATUR Peruvian Aviation School
about: AVIATUR Peruvian Aviation School is a reputable flight training institution in Peru, offering comprehensive programs for aspiring pilots. We provide training for Private Pilot Licence (PPL) and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), ensuring students gain the necessary skills and knowledge to succeed in aviation. Located at Lib Mandy (Mandi) Airport, approximately 70 km south of Lima, our school operates in a General Aviation environment with a single paved runway. Our experienced instructors, including those with commercial airline backgrounds, guide students through rigorous training, adhering to international standards. AVIATUR is committed to delivering high-quality flight education, preparing students for successful careers in aviation. We emphasize safety, proficiency, and the development of aviation skills, making us a trusted choice for pilot training in Peru.
